actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Executive Comment Requested from Army, OMB.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to enter into an agreement with the City of Sacramento, California, under which the City of Sacramento will reimburse the Secretary for the continued operation and maintenance of the William G. Stone Lock and to authorize the City of Sacramento to collect tolls or other fees for the use of such lock.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to enter into an agreement with the city of Sacramento, California, to continue to operate and maintain the William G. Stone Lock. Requires Sacramento to reimburse the Secretary for the costs of operation and maintenance. Authorizes Sacramento to levy and collect tolls or other fees for the use of such lock.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to enter into an agreement with the City of Sacramento, California, under which the City of Sacramento will reimburse the Secretary for the continued operation and maintenance of the William G. Stone Lock and to authorize the City of Sacramento to collect tolls or other fees for the use of such lock.
